3.title: Fun with Powdered Alcohol

episode of.title: Out of Office with Brent Rose (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: People are freaking out about powdered alcohol, but I wasn't convinced they understood the science behind it. So I tested their concerns. Will it get you crazy drunk? Will people snort it? Watch & see! -Brent

4.title: Best & Worst Foods for California's Drought

episode of.title: Out of Office with Brent Rose (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: California is in an unprecedented drought, but you gotta eat, right? Well, some foods use way more water than others. We chewed through a ton of data to make this bite-sized video. For you! -Brent

5.title: GoPro Hero4 Session

episode of.title: Out of Office with Brent Rose (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: If you hate GoPro's rectangular shape, your prayers have been answered! Sort of. We took the new Hero4 Session into rivers, lakes, and surf, off cliffs and platforms, through trees and go kart courses. Our full review will tell you everything you need to know.

6.title: Stress Testing Rideables

episode of.title: Out of Office with Brent Rose (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Electric personal transportation devices (aka "rideables") are everywhere. We're seeing them under everyone from Justin Bieber to J.R. Smith to Casey Neistat, but are any of them worth a damn? We put four of the most promising rideables to the test and I've got the scars to prove it. -Brent

7.title: Teched-Out Van

episode of.title: Out of Office with Brent Rose (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Brent Rose has just taken "Out of Office" to the next level. In this episode, he shows off the teched-out van he will be living in during his nascent year-long road trip across the United States. Brent gives us a fun tour of his supremely techy mobile home, including the roof-mounted solar panels, cutting edge lithium ion batteries, GPS-enabled, smartphone-connected alarm system, fingerprint-secu

10.title: Is Vaping Really Healthier Than Smoking?

episode of.title: Out of Office with Brent Rose (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Vaping is smoking's hottest new trend--just ask Leonardo DiCarpio who was caught puffing on one at the Golden Globes. The industry claims this is a safe alternative to cigarettes, but how much do we really know about the health effects of vaping? From The Vape Shop to USC's Health and Science campus, Brent Rose explores this new trend and searches for answers.

imdb.title: Out of Office with Brent Rose
akas: Out of Office with Brent Rose (United States)
plot: Veteran journalist Brent Rose (Wired, Gizmodo, Popular Science, Outside Mag, more) takes tech out of the office and gets down and dirty, testing the latest products and fads, explaining science and technology in a fun, approachable way.
